name: Version 1.45
body:
![Icon](src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi/ic_launcher.png)
 * Fix reference setting fail, save int value on exception
 
The preferences API doesn't allow a value type to be changed from int to float, causing an exception, so save an int on exception until the app is reinstalled or the app data is cleared.

name: Version 1.31
body:
![ic_launcher](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3448386/54087179-5f794480-4348-11e9-8b1f-aedc10d29df2.png)
 * Use shapes for sharp and flat symbol
 * Request permissions for **Microphone** and **Storage** on android versions 6 and greater
 * Look for a `Custom.txt` custom temperaments file in both `Android/data/org.billthefarmer.tuner/files` and `Tuner` folders.

**Note** - A `Custom.txt` file in the `Android...` folder will be deleted if the app is uninstalled

name: Version 1.30
body:
![ic_launcher](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3448386/52080704-59958400-2590-11e9-95de-7ab66c5fb168.png)
 * Add custom temperaments option
 * Add read sdcard permission to read custom temperaments file

Load custom temperaments by placing a file in `Tuner/Custom.txt`.
The file should contain one or more entries formatted as property entries.
The format is documented [here](https://developer.android.com/reference/java/util/Properties#load\(java.io.Reader\)).

```properties
# Custom Temperaments
Custom: 1.000000000, 1.067871094, 1.125000000, 1.185185185, \
        1.265625000, 1.333333333, 1.423828125, 1.500000000, \
        1.601806641, 1.687500000, 1.777777778, 1.898437500
```

Entries will be loaded and displayed in **Settings** in alphabetical
order at the end of the list. Erroneous entries will either be ignored
or replaced with ones (1.0).

name: Version 1.29
body:
![ic_launcher](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3448386/51933781-fd006080-23f9-11e9-836d-0c0faca0efac.png)
 * Add temperament and key options
 * Wrap top two octaves on staff

For all temperaments except for equal it is necessary to choose a key. See [Musical temperament](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musical_temperament).

name: Version 1.21
body:
![ic_launcher](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3448386/37213719-ccb42d58-23aa-11e8-9d8c-f6cfffc77709.png)
* Add fundamental filter and note and octave filters from ideas by @malberts 

The fundamental filter will only show results which are the same musical note as the lowest detected.
The note filter allows selection of specific notes and octaves and will not show results that are deselected.

name: Version 1.20
body:
![ic_launcher](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3448386/36331545-26e49c36-1366-11e8-95ba-3820c1a469b2.png)
* Add Brazilian Portuguese translation by @afmachado 
* Add change theme by long touch on strobe

Tuner-filters.apk is an experimental release with fundamental, note and octave filtering. You will need to uninstall your existing version before it will install and uninstall it before upgrading from F-Droid or here as it is signed with a different signature. You will lose the settings.
